sources.title: The Edge Of Human
sources.description: A Blade Runner short film from Macau. Jeter investigates a bunch of fugitive androids who kidnapped a moonbus from mars. There he befriended a female android named Marie, with her friendship he starts to hesitate his investigation.

metadata.Plot: Detective Jeter returns to the downtown of lower site of Macao to hunt down illegal androids. Until he meets Marie who has been implanted false memories in her. Jeter start second guessing his own edge of his humanity.
metadata.Actors: Johan Karlberg, Lily Ge, Rika Kishida
